review: Meh. This might be nice one day, but with the limited apps, it seems kind of pointless. Netflix, youtube and Hulu are already available on my xbox and bluray player, and they buffer the video streams much better and they've got better interfaces. Plus I can never get audio to work when I'm streaming a tab from Chrome. Maybe in a few years, when they start letting developers actually release stuff for it, it will be better, for right now, at least it's pretty cheap.
